articles.description: The redesigned Ford Mustang, the S650, will keep the V-8 but augment it with electrification.
articles.content:
A prototype for the seventh-generation Ford Mustang, the S650, has been spotted for the first time.
Previously thought to be arriving in late 2022 as a 2023 model, the car is now expected to arrive … [+2373 chars]
